title: Ep 39: Dr. Pimple Popper
itunes:title: Ep 39: Dr. Pimple Popper
itunes:subtitle: Sandra Lee, MD—better known as Dr. Pimple Popper—takes us into her weird, wild world of blackheads, cysts, and lypomas and shares the technique for a perfect pimple pop. Plus, after a month of testing 2016's top-selling drugstore mascaras, we can...
description:
Sandra Lee, MD—better known as Dr. Pimple Popper—takes us into her weird, wild world of blackheads, cysts, and lypomas and shares the technique for a perfect pimple pop. Plus, after a month of testing 2016's top-selling drugstore mascaras, we can finally reveal our favorites, including a few surprises! We also remember to be beautiful inside and out thanks to rock goddess Shirley Manson and talk about how sanitary (or not) it is to use retail makeup testers.

Become a member at https://plus.acast.com/s/fatmascara.


Hosted on Acast. See acast.com/privacy for more information.
